field.name: basic_renderable_item.gap.x
field.description: X-distance between the left edge of the sprite and the left edge of the item.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.gap.y
field.description: Y-distance between the top edge of the sprite and the top edge of the item.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.use_system_angle_as_visual_angle
field.description: Apply the system angle of the item to the visual (and ignore the value of visual_angle).

field.name: basic_renderable_item.auto_angular_speed_factor
field.description: The factor of movement applied at angular speed.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.angle
field.description: The angle applied to the sprites of the item when rendering.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.color
field.description: The color applied to the sprites of the item when rendering.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.flip
field.description: Flip vertically the sprites of the item when rendering.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.mirror
field.description: Flip horizontally the sprites of the item when rendering.

field.name: basic_renderable_item.auto_flip
field.description: Tell if the item must be automatically flipped vertically (if its vertical speed is greater than zero).

field.name: basic_renderable_item.auto_mirror
field.description: Tell if the item must be automatically flipped horizontally (if its horizontal speed is less than zero).
